message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it provides. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. In order to reach an agreement, I am willing to consider $100 for the product. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and your assessment of its worth.
